MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG12 postcode area of Annan, affecting properties in Fernlea Crescent and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.55pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair we now require further resource on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.31pm on Wednesday 17th February 2021.
